attributes.action: Vaccinate retail staff as a priority.
attributes.additional_details:
We are front line staff, as are NHS and care workers. Why are we forgotten about?  Why does the government not care about us and see us as expendable? We are key workers, without us the country would be brought to a standstill, yet we aren't in a priority vaccination group, even though we deal with members of the public every day, many of who refuse to wear masks and/or use sanitising stations. We need the vaccine as much as nhs staff, so why aren't we getting it? 
This has to change now.
attributes.background: Put retail staff into a priority group for covid-19 vaccination.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567426
